title: Hard Worker
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>Maki, Maki......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Huh......? Oh, I fell asleep, didn’t I...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Even with the sun out, you can catch a cold if you doze off like that, you know.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I know... Yawn......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>You’ve been studying hard, haven’t you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>...What do you mean?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I’m not just talking about your homework. I saw that you’ve even been doing extra practice problems, too. You’ve been putting in an impressive amount of effort, Maki.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>W-Well, that’s just normal behavior! I’m going to be a doctor in the future, after all...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Hehe. Are you blushing?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Of course not! Come on, we’re supposed to practice, right? Let’s go to the rooftop!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
